item.title: Moving
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
Let's get moving

Simple, Secure, Done

Get Started

How it works

Order Online

Contact us via the form below and we will send you a FREE quote or call you back with details.

Move

Our professional team will load all your boxes, furniture or anything required.

unpack

Your items will be ready for you at the new location by the requested time.

Hassle free moving

item.title: Wedding
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
The wedding celebration of

Lorena & Steven

December 17, 2017

the bride

Lorena Tayler

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin tempor justo sed quam luctus, nec semper lectus iaculis. Nulla a mattis nunc. Nullam rhoncus dui eget erat aliquam, quis sagittis ipsum lacinia. Ut molestie faucibus lacinia.

the groom

Steven Kudrow

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin tempor justo sed quam luctus, nec semper lectus iaculis. Nulla a mattis nunc. Nullam rhoncus dui eget erat aliquam, quis sagittis ipsum lacinia. Ut molestie faucibus lacinia.

"To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything."

T. Tolis

the best men

Look at these handsome fellas

Bridesmaids

The gorgeous group of gals

Wedding weekend itinerary

Rehearsal

Date

December 17, 2019

Schedule

From 18:00 PM

Venue

3355, Wayside Lane, nakland, CA 94601

Ceremony

Date

December 18, 2019

Schedule

From 14:00 PM

Venue

3355, Wayside Lane, nakland, CA 94601

Brunch

Date

December 19, 2019

Schedule

From 10:00 AM

Venue

3355, Wayside Lane, nakland, CA 94601

Are you attending?

Please RSVP Before April 1th

I'll be there

item.title: Under Construction
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
Under construction

We have a few quirks to fix, but we will have everything up and running in no time. Please come back in a few hours.

Contact Us

For any question please send us a message to hello@email.com

Support Forum

You are invited to visit our support forum and knowledge base

Customer Service

To talk to a representative, please call 1900-123-123

item.title: Tattoo Parlor
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
You think it, We ink it

Established 1993

Make an appointment

Welcome

About Us

Situated on Berlin Avenue amidst the influential locale of Hollywood, Our Tattoo shop opened its doors in 1992 and has been a prominent provider of specialized artistic tattoo design, consulting and superior piercing services. A sanctuary of creative self-expression, the studio withholds a zero-attitude policy. Each client is treated with integrity and respect, and we do not discriminate against race, nationality, religious background or sexual orientation. We blend old-school values with modern safety standards. Our tattoo and piercing artists are fully licensed and highly knowledgeable. Please do not hesitate to stop by or contact us with any questions. We are looking forward to meeting you.

Our Services

TAKE A LOAD OFF AND STAY A WHILE

Tattoo

Situated on Berlin Avenue amidst the influential locale of Hollywood, Our Tattoo shop opened its doors in 1992 and has been a prominent provider of specialized artistic tattoo design, consulting and superior piercing services. A sanctuary of creative self-expression, the studio withholds a zero-attitude policy. Each client is treated with integrity and respect, and we do not discriminate against race, nationality, religious background or sexual orientation. We blend old-school values with modern safety standards. Our tattoo and piercing artists are fully licensed and highly knowledgeable. 

From $199

Piercing

Situated on Berlin Avenue amidst the influential locale of Hollywood, Our Tattoo shop opened its doors in 1992 and has been a prominent provider of specialized artistic tattoo design, consulting and superior piercing services. A sanctuary of creative self-expression, the studio withholds a zero-attitude policy. Each client is treated with integrity and respect, and we do not discriminate against race, nationality, religious background or sexual orientation. 

From $99

Tattoo Removal

Situated on Berlin Avenue amidst the influential locale of Hollywood, Our Tattoo shop opened its doors in 1992 and has been a prominent provider of specialized artistic tattoo design, consulting and superior piercing services. A sanctuary of creative self-expression, the studio withholds a zero-attitude.

From $299

Permanent Cosmetic & Makeup

Situated on Berlin Avenue amidst the influential locale of Hollywood, Our Tattoo shop opened its doors in 1992 and has been a prominent provider of specialized artistic tattoo design, consulting and superior piercing services. A sanctuary of creative self-expression, the studio withholds a zero-attitude policy. Each client is treated with integrity and respect, and we do not discriminate against race, nationality, religious background or sexual orientation.

From $179

Awards

Great work takes time, and we’d like to make sure you have the best experience possible at our shop. Walk ins are welcome, depending on availability – but appointments are preferred. Please contact us to book your session today. Create a masterpiece with us!

Instagram

Artists

Quality is not an act, it's a habit

Daniel Johnson

Tattoo Artist

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Barbara Parker

Piercing Artist

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Peter Balboa

Tattoo Artist

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Steve Miller

Tattoo Artist

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Bob Peterson

Tattoo Artist

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Elizabeth Norton

Tattoo Artist

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Walk-in Welcome. Appointments Preferred.

Great work takes time, and we’d like to make sure you have the best experience possible at our shop. Walk ins are welcome, depending on availability – but appointments are preferred. Please contact us to book your session today. Create a masterpiece with us!

Make an appointment

Testimonials

What Our Customers Are Saying

"

It’s was an excellent experience for me, it’s a clean and healthy place to go. They are all really friendly and makes you feel comfortable. Peter is an amazing artist!!!”

Elizabeth Norton

Designer

"

Very quick and thorough. I had my cartilage pierced by Barbara and she explained everything from start to finish. Made sure to ask where I wanted to the piercing and told me what to expect.

Elsa Morisson

Singer

"

It’s was an excellent experience for me, it’s a clean and healthy place to go. They are all really friendly and makes you feel comfortable. Peter is an amazing artist!!!”

Maria Monroe

Actress

Latest Inks

A small sample of what we can do



Make an appointment

Newsletter

Subscribe to our newsletter to receive exclusive offers and the latest news on our products and services.

Contact

Where To Find Us

Have a project you're interested in discussing with us? Drop us a line below, we’d love to talk.

Our Studio

301 Lakewood, Custard Factory
Los Angeles, E1234

Phone

+30 1234 56789

Email

inked@cssigniter.com

Opening Hours

Mon-Fri: 10:00am - 20:00pm

Contact

Get In Touch

item.title: Restaurant
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
Our Sweets

Handcrafted delights that instantly brighten up your day. Whether its chocolate, vanilla or cinnamon, we use the finest ingredients to produce these mouth watering artifacts.



“Tasty food, set inside a lovely coffee house.”

It was an real incredible experience for me. The quality of food was only matched by the quality of service I got. I wish I can keep the flavor in my mouth for ever. Thanks for making the evening an unforgettable one. Sandra Files

Tasty Breakfast

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec mattis pulvinar 

Birthdays & Events

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec mattis pulvinar 

Fresh Coffee

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec mattis pulvinar 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9uOETcuFjbE

Our Sweets Collection

The best way to experience our wide collection of sweets is to visit the store. Follow the aromas and choose the most enticing sweets to satisfy your palate.

More Sweets

Visit Us

  • 1123 4rd St. San Francisco, CA 66507
  • reservation@domain.com
  • (315) 435 77 16
  • (315) 435 77 33

item.title: Pastry Shop
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
Cakes handcrafted with care

A little bliss in every bite

Order Now

Cakes handcrafted with care

Welcome to our shop

The Pastry Store is true to tradition using only the freshest and finest ingredients. They can create especially for you unique pastries and anything else you may desire by order. Our pastries can decorate your buffet for all your special events, weddings, baptisms, parties, anniversaries, conventions and all business get togethers and will make each event special and enjoyable.

Order Now 0 Years of experience 0 Cake designs 0 Awards 0 Happy customers

For the love of cake

Our Services

Our pastry shop presents an exquisite culinary experience for any occasion you can imagine!

Fast Delivery

The Pastry Store Allotino is true to  tradition using only the freshest and finest ingredients. 

Online Ordering

Our pastry shop presents an exquisite culinary experience for any occasion you can imagine!

Event Order

Our pastry shop presents an exquisite culinary experience for any occasion you can imagine!

Decoration Services

Our pastry shop presents an exquisite culinary experience for any occasion you can imagine!

Cooking Classes

Our pastry shop presents an exquisite culinary experience for any occasion you can imagine!

Birthday Parties

Our pastry shop presents an exquisite culinary experience for any occasion you can imagine!

Sign up and win a free master class

[mc4wp_form id="1646"]

For the sweetest occasion ever!

Our Products

Bliss provides its customers with high-quality products for the safe production of outstandingly tasting pastry products.

Dark Chocolate Cakes

$50

No gluten? No problem. This gorgeous dark chocolate cake gets its flavor and body from dark chocolate and whipped. There’s no need for flour which just leaves more room for the good stuff.

ingredients

Semisweet chocolate, fresh creamery butter, eggs, sugar, Valrhona cocoa, kosher salt.

Seasonal Fruit Tart

$39

No gluten? No problem. This gorgeous dark chocolate cake gets its flavor and body from dark chocolate and whipped. There’s no need for flour which just leaves more room for the good stuff.

ingredients

ingredients

$19,95

ingredients

ingredients

01

Nature & Wildlife

Wildlife can be found in all ecosystems. Deserts, forests, rain forests, plains, grasslands and other areas including the most developed urban areas, all have distinct forms of wildlife. While the term in popular culture usually refers to animals that are untouched by human factors, most scientists agree that much wildlife is affected by human activities.

item.content:encoded:
Hey,

I’M DANNY NYGAARD.

UX/UI Designer & web developer

01

about

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum ultricies sollicitudin ante nec mattis. Mauris eget ornare nibh. Nam venenatis porta diam scelerisque suscipit. Donec in vehicula ligula. Etiam efficitur quam ex, at consectetur magna porttitor at. Nullam convallis, eros a vulputate tincidunt, mauris lorem tincidunt sem, sed cursus neque sem a est. Nam malesuada ipsum orci, et congue ligula fringilla vitae. Praesent vitae molestie elit. Phasellus non felis sit amet massa fermentum aliquam. Fusce dui est, dapibus quis eros at, eleifend vehicula lectus. Mauris congue risus in lectus suscipit efficitur.

item.title: Elementor
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
- Since 1984 -

The greatest good you’re ever gonna get.

Join For Free

Who we are

Organizing large events is our passion. Since the early start we wanted to enrich you experience, making it meaningful and not just fun and exciting.

Why we are

When you visit our event hall for the first time, it transforms your life, and connects you to the people you always wanted to get to know and love.

Where you are

Are you seeking something different? An opportunity? We invite you to join the conversation our community has been having for the past 30 years.

How it starts

Our events are held every day, every hour and every minute. It takes place everywhere, and nowhere, both at the same time. Don't worry, you will find us.

Try it Yourself

What makes design so alluring? We believes the answer is designers. That's why we have made our entire focus on you - the designer. Your style, your ideas, your creativity. Go on - Try, share and design now!

Get Started

Play it forward

We've worked for over a year to offer you the best possible web design solution. Now, all you need to do is press 'Play'.

Revolution

We all want to change the world. But when you talk about destruction, don't you know that you can count me out. Don't you know it's gonna be alright?

Download Now Take a Tour

A good portfolio will get you an interview. A good attitude will get you a job.

We have a great opportunity for experienced photographers to join our team. Yes, we do need you to already own a camera. No, your iPhone camera won't cut it. Go on, 'Shoot' us a message.

Surf's up!

There are 23 million estimated surfers around the world. The longest amount of time spent surfing one wave is 37 minutes. There are many other reasons you should get on board.

Catch Our Wave

Your Journey

Desert Tiptoes Inc. is a company that set forth to boldly go where no other company has gone before, and to get as many individuals to walk barefoot across the Sahara desert, leaving beautiful and temporary foot marks behind. When we started, we had no clear vision as to why we wanted to get people to do that. Today, 20 years later, we are still kinda confused.

Take The First Step

Do what I want, not what I say.

Learn More

Hello.

I love you, won't you tell me your name? These immortal words by legendary musician Jim Morrison are still as relevant today, in this digital age, as they were back then. 

Let's Meet

Writing, made simple.

Everyone can write, but not everyone is a writer. What makes the difference is the keen eye for detail and beauty.

If you feel lost, disappointed, hesitant, or weak, return to yourself, to who you are, here and now and when you get there, you will discover yourself, like a lotus flower in full bloom, even in a muddy pond, beautiful and strong.

Masaru Emoto

Design is an opportunity

We want to create something that does more than just look nice on a page. How are the creative stories of the future going to look like?

Photographer

The photo occurs in a broader scope than the snap of the camera. It starts with the first glance of attention

Video Art

We all shun away from it on museums, but in the real world, video art can, and does, make a difference

Web Design

Endless design possibilities start with a single possibility that wants to expand further than ever before

item.title: Travel
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
5 days in Prague

from Exploring Prague in 5 days will allow a deep look into the treasures of this beautiful city. With its charming alleys which call you to simply stroll in, its Gothic churches and medival architecture, Prague is simply one of the best cities in Europe. Learn More

Duration

5 Days, 3 Nights

Destinations

7 Places to visit

Accommodation

5* Luxury hotel

Travel

Small group with private guide

Why Prague?

Exploring Prague in 5 days will allow a deep look into the treasures of this beautiful city. With its charming alleys which call you to simply stroll in, its Gothic churches and medival architecture, Prague is simply one of the best cities in Europe.

Itinerary

  • Day 1

Arrival and private transfer to your hotel in Prague

  • Prague
Welcome to Prague. Upon arrival at in the Airport Prague, meet with our staff and we will transfer to your hotel. You will be given your room key and take a rest in the hotel, enjoy the lunch. After lunch we will pick you up from your hotel and shall start our tour today. Prague - Way of kings, this tour is an excellent introduction to the historical part of Prague, you will follow the steps of Czech Kings who took the same way to reach Prague Castle and St. Vitus Cathedral for the coronation. The journey starts at the Powder Gate, continues through the Old Town Square and through Karlova Street all the way to Charles Bridge where you can admire breathtaking views of Prague Castle and Vltava River. At night, you will see the different side of Prague. Tonight we will aboard the River Cruise with Dinner to enjoy Pragues history and atmosphere in an unusual way. Choose this night tour to spend an unforgettable evening cruising on Vltava River and admiring illuminated Prague. You will explore the monuments of the Old and New Town of Prague, Vysehrad, National Theatre, Charles Bridge and the unforgettable panoramic views of Prague Castle. During the three hour cruise buffet dinner will be served on board, accompanied by stylish music. The night cruise on Vltava will impress you deeply. After the end of the cruise, buses will take you on a ride through romantic places of Prague by night. Overnight in Prague.

Included

Breakfast

Karlstejn Castle Tour

  • Karlstejn Castle
Welcome to Prague. Upon arrival at in the Airport Prague, meet with our staff and we will transfer to your hotel. You will be given your room key and take a rest in the hotel, enjoy the lunch. After lunch we will pick you up from your hotel and shall start our tour today. Prague - Way of kings, this tour is an excellent introduction to the historical part of Prague, you will follow the steps of Czech Kings who took the same way to reach Prague Castle and St. Vitus Cathedral for the coronation. The journey starts at the Powder Gate, continues through the Old Town Square and through Karlova Street all the way to Charles Bridge where you can admire breathtaking views of Prague Castle and Vltava River. At night, you will see the different side of Prague. Tonight we will aboard the River Cruise with Dinner to enjoy Pragues history and atmosphere in an unusual way. Choose this night tour to spend an unforgettable evening cruising on Vltava River and admiring illuminated Prague. You will explore the monuments of the Old and New Town of Prague, Vysehrad, National Theatre, Charles Bridge and the unforgettable panoramic views of Prague Castle. During the three hour cruise buffet dinner will be served on board, accompanied by stylish music. The night cruise on Vltava will impress you deeply. After the end of the cruise, buses will take you on a ride through romantic places of Prague by night. Overnight in Prague.

Ceski Krumlov - UNESCO Sight Tour

  • Ceski Krumlov
Welcome to Prague. Upon arrival at in the Airport Prague, meet with our staff and we will transfer to your hotel. You will be given your room key and take a rest in the hotel, enjoy the lunch. After lunch we will pick you up from your hotel and shall start our tour today. Prague - Way of kings, this tour is an excellent introduction to the historical part of Prague, you will follow the steps of Czech Kings who took the same way to reach Prague Castle and St. Vitus Cathedral for the coronation. The journey starts at the Powder Gate, continues through the Old Town Square and through Karlova Street all the way to Charles Bridge where you can admire breathtaking views of Prague Castle and Vltava River.

Inclusions

  • Arrival airport transfer from Airport Prague
  • 4 nights hotel in Prague
  • 4 breakfasts, 1 lunch and 2 dinners in hotel
  • Guided Prague - Way of King Tour
  • River Cruise with Dinner
  • Guided Karlstejn Castle Tour with lunch
  • Guided Ceski Krumlov - UNESCO Sight Tour
  • Guided Grand City Tour of Prague
  • Guided Prague - Way of King Tour
  • Professional English speaking guide
  • All entrance fees to all museums mentioned in the itinerary
  • Transportation in a fully air-conditioned, non-smoking coach
  • Professional English speaking guide

Gallery



Read what our clients say

Testimonials

Wow the vacation was raw, intense, and informative all at the same time. I am so glad I did it. Amazing guide and very unique. Thank you. Helen Poppins London

Why choose us?

500+Destinations

When we envision the perfect vacation, we see great hotels, amazing food, incredible sightseeing, and above all, we imagine creating memories galore! What we don't picture is what it takes to organize a jaw-dropping, stress-free getaway.

Welcome to Prague. Upon arrival at in the Airport Prague, meet with our staff and we will transfer to your hotel. You will be given your room key and take a rest in the hotel, enjoy the lunch.<\/p>

After lunch we will pick you up from your hotel and shall start our tour today. Prague - Way of kings, this tour is an excellent introduction to the historical part of Prague, you will follow the steps of Czech Kings who took the same way to reach Prague Castle and St. Vitus Cathedral for the coronation. The journey starts at the Powder Gate, continues through the Old Town Square and through Karlova Street all the way to Charles Bridge where you can admire breathtaking views of Prague Castle and Vltava River.<\/p>

At night, you will see the different side of Prague. Tonight we will aboard the River Cruise with Dinner to enjoy Pragues history and atmosphere in an unusual way. Choose this night tour to spend an unforgettable evening cruising on Vltava River and admiring illuminated Prague. You will explore the monuments of the Old and New Town of Prague, Vysehrad, National Theatre, Charles Bridge and the unforgettable panoramic views of Prague Castle. During the three hour cruise buffet dinner will be served on board, accompanied by stylish music. The night cruise on Vltava will impress you deeply. After the end of the cruise, buses will take you on a ride through romantic places of Prague by night. Overnight in Prague.<\/p>","align":"left","text_color":"#565656","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":24},"typography_font_family":"Lato","typography_font_weight":"300","_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"typography_font_size_mobile":{"unit":"px","size":18},"typography_line_height":{"unit":"em","size":1.6000000000000001}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"3244db45","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"7abd25fb","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"cfce368","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no"},"elements":[{"id":"2837cc00","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"5182504c","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"Included","align":"left","title_color":"#212121","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":38},"typography_font_family":"Playfair Display","typography_font_weight":"900","_padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"5","left":"0","isLinked":false},"_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"300","bottom":"25","left":"0","isLinked":false},"align_mobile":"center","_margin_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"12b0f646","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","structure":"30","animation":"zoomIn"},"elements":[{"id":"540ff3ea","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":33,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"5c520ca3","elType":"widget","settings":{"icon":"fa fa-coffee","title_text":"Breakfast","description_text":"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: E-Book
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
the entrepreneur

presents

Starting a business is

hard work

skip my mistakes and do things right the first time.

GRAB MY FREE E-BOOK

280 pages full of insights

Chapter 1

Know Your Market

A target market is a group of customers within the serviceable available market that a business has decided to aim its marketing efforts towards.

Chapter 2

Know Your Competition

Competition is often considered to be the opposite of cooperation, however in the real world, mixtures of cooperation and competition are the norm.

Chapter 3

Be Different

In economics and marketing, product differentiation (or simply differentiation) is the process of distinguishing a product or service from others, to make it more attractive to a particular target market

Over 10,000 Downloads

Just sign up and receive my free e-book instantly! I hate spam more than you do.

Please note: The form above requires Elementor Pro. You can, of course, use any other free contact form plugins like Contact form 7 or WPForms.

Chapter 4

Pricing Techniques

A business can use a variety of pricing strategies when selling a product or service. The price can be set to maximize profitability for each unit sold or from the market overall.

Chapter 6

Paralysis By Analysis

Paralysis by analysis is the state of over-analyzing (or over-thinking) a situation so that a decision or action is never taken, in effect paralyzing the outcome.

Chapter 5

The Future

Profile

After leaving Apple, Jobs took a few of its members with him to found NeXT, a computer platform development company specializing in state-of-the-art computers for higher-education and business markets. In addition, Jobs helped to initiate the development of the visual effects industry when he funded the spinout of the computer graphics division of George Lucas's Lucasfilm in 1986. The new company, Pixar, would eventually produce the first fully computer-animated film, Toy Story—an event made possible in part because of Jobs's financial support.

item.title: Barber Shop
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
The Barber Shop

Est. 1986

Call Us Today

123-456-789

Skype: Kio

Address

98 Barber Str.

New York, 19800

Working Hours

Mon - fri: 9am - 8pm

saturday: 9am - 3pm

Welcome To Avas

The Barber Shop

A barber (from the Latin barba, "beard") is a person whose occupation is mainly to cut, dress, groom, style and shave men's and boys' hair. A barber's place of work is known as a "barber shop" or a "barber's".

In modern times, the term "barber" is used both as a professional title and to refer to hairdressers who specialize in men's hair. Historically, all hairdressers were considered barbers. In the 20th century, the profession of cosmetology branched off from barbering, and today hairdressers may be licensed as either barbers or cosmetologists. Barbers differ with respect to where they work, which services they are licensed to provide, and what name they use to refer to themselves. Part of this terminology difference depends on the regulations in a given location.

In modern times, the term \"barber\" is used both as a professional title and to refer to hairdressers who specialize in men's hair. Historically, all hairdressers were considered barbers. In the 20th century, the profession of cosmetology branched off from barbering, and today hairdressers may be licensed as either barbers or cosmetologists. Barbers differ with respect to where they work, which services they are licensed to provide, and what name they use to refer to themselves. Part of this terminology difference depends on the regulations in a given
